sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The life and actions of the renowned prelate & souldier, Christopher Bernard van Gale, Bishop of Munster, Prince of the Holy Empire, Adminstrator of Corvay, Marquess of Stomberg &c. in which is an account of the most considerable actions of Europe in his time. Historisch verhael van 't leven en orlogsbedryf van de Heer Christopher van Galen. English Vries, S. de (Simon), b. 1630.
[6], 175 p., [1] leaf of plates : 1 port.
Printed for Benj. Tooke, Rob. Harford, and Sam. Carr, London : 1680.
Written by S. de Vries. Cf. BM. Translation of: Historisch verhael van 't leven en orlogsbedryf van de Heer Christopher van Galen. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
The life and actions of the renowned prelate & souldier, Christopher Bernard van Gale, Bishop of Munster, Prince of the Holy Empire, Adminstrator of Corvay, Marquess of Stomberg &c. in which is an account of the most considerable actions of Europe in his time. Historisch verhael van 't leven en orlogsbedryf van de Heer Christopher van Galen. English Vries, S. de (Simon), b. 1630.
[6], 175 p., [1] leaf of plates : 1 port.
Printed for Benj. Tooke, Rob. Harford, and Sam. Carr, London : 1680.
Written by S. de Vries. Cf. BM. Translation of: Historisch verhael van 't leven en orlogsbedryf van de Heer Christopher van Galen. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Rob. Harford
